TopicTitle: Extending the usage of the escape button.

Articles.Content: Right now, if you are at KSC, and press escape, it will quit to the menu. However this fuction is not working everywhere. It would be useful if we could tap esc in the VAB (SPH, TS, etc.) for example to leave to KSC; double tapping in the VAB (SPH, TC, etc.) would quit to the menu.
